name: stingily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you are unwilling to spend money, or that is small in amount: She lived frugally, but not stingily. There's a water dispenser where people can fill up stingily tiny plastic cups.
More examplesFewer examplesThe book has been stingily downsized from the original hardback edition.Companies spent stingily on their computer systems last year, but as the economy picks up, they’re spending more.The cheese was chopped into small squares and stingily scattered on top of the pizza.
